summary: WS&S is an ambitious project that intends to retexture every standard sword and shield in the game,and a \"painted\" feel for the world overall. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=25]Watercolor Swords And Shields[/size] [/color]By Andrewtak(Or Andrewattack :p)

[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/WSSTITLE.png[/IMG]
____________________________________________________________

[color=green][size=19]About:[/size] [/color]

WS&S is an ambitious project that intends to retexture every standard sword and shield in the game,
and a \"painted\" feel for the world overall. Enjoy!

____________________________________________________________

[color=orange][size=19]What it retextures:[/size] [/color]

I plan to retexture  every sword and shield in the game. 
I\'m also planning to retexture the lanscape and towns (but that will be another mod).
____________________________________________________________

[color=blue][size=19]Installation Process:[/size] [/color]

Drag the \"Weapons\" and \"Armor\" files into your \"Textures\" file (usually located in Skyrim/Data)

_____________________________________________________________

[color=red][size=19]Unstallation Process:[/size] [/color]

Just delete the \"Weapons\" and \"Armor\" files and poof, it\'s gone.

_____________________________________________________________

If you have any problems with the mod, please report them in the chat box, and I\'ll surely respond in a day or so!

[size=25]Thanks and if you like this mod then please support and endorse it![/size]
author: Andrewtak
